analyzed: shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor /
translated: ‚ÄúWisdom of knowledge‚Äù is the complete relinquishment of all the mental afflictions of all sentient beings.

original: thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ste /

analyzed: tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gshe yang slar mi gshe /

original: bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas khros kyang slar mi khro //
analyzed: bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas khros kyang slar mi khro //

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu rnyed pa'o //

analyzed: ye shes ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la kun dri bya'o //

original: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas /
